00085 void GenericDataHeader::AddNameValParam(const ParameterNameValueType &entry)
00086 {
00087         ParameterNameValueTypeIt ii = FindNameValParam(entry);
00088         if (ii == nameValParams.end())
00089         {
00090                 // Add
00091                 nameValParams.push_back(entry);
00092         }
00093         else
00094         {
00095                 // Update
00096                 *ii = entry;
00097         }
00098 }
00099 
00100 ParameterNameValueType GenericDataHeader::GetNameValParam(int32_t index)
00101 {
00102         return nameValParams[index];
00103 }

00105 int32_t GenericDataHeader::GetNameValParamCnt() const
00106 {
00107         return (int32_t)nameValParams.size();
00108 }

00110 void GenericDataHeader::GetNameValIterators(ParameterNameValueTypeIt &begin, ParameterNameValueTypeIt &end)
00111 {
00112         begin = nameValParams.begin();
00113         end = nameValParams.end();
00114 }

00116 void GenericDataHeader::AddParent(const GenericDataHeader &hdr)

00118         GenericDataHdrs.push_back(hdr);

00124         end = GenericDataHdrs.end();

00137 /*
00138  * Find an immediate parent GenericDataHeader based on file type id.  Does not search grand-parents or above.
00139  */
00140 GenericDataHeader* GenericDataHeader::FindParent(const std::string& fileTypeId)
00141 {
00142         GenericDataHeader* parentGDH = 0;
00143         GenDataHdrVectorIt begin, end;
00144         GetParentIterators(begin, end);
00145         for (GenDataHdrVectorIt ii = begin; ii != end; ++ii)
00146         {
00147                 if (ii->GetFileTypeId() == fileTypeId)
00148                 {
00149                         parentGDH = &(*ii);
00150                         break;
00151                 }
00152         }
00153         return parentGDH;
00154 }
00155 
00156 bool GenericDataHeader::FindNameValParam(const std::wstring& name, ParameterNameValueType& result)
00157 {
00158         ParameterNameValueType t;
00159         t.SetName(name);
00160         t.SetValueText(L"");
00161         ParameterNameValueTypeIt found = FindNameValParam(t);
00162         if (found != nameValParams.end())
00163         {
00164                 result = *found;
00165                 return true;
00166         }
00167         return false;
00168 }
00169 
00170 ParameterNameValueTypeIt GenericDataHeader::FindNameValParam(const ParameterNameValueType& p)
00171 {
00172         ParameterNameValueTypeIt begin, end;
00173         begin = nameValParams.begin();
00174         end = nameValParams.end();
00175 
00176         ParameterNameValueTypeIt ii = std::find(begin, end, p);
00177         if (ii != end)
00178         {
00179                 return ii;
00180         }
00181         else
00182                 return end;
00183 }
00184 
00185 bool GenericDataHeader::GetNameValParamsBeginsWith(const std::wstring& beginsWith, ParameterNameValueTypeVector& p)
00186 {
00187         p.clear();
00188 
00189         for (ParameterNameValueTypeIt ii = nameValParams.begin(); ii != nameValParams.end(); ++ii)
00190         {
00191                 if (ii->GetName().find(beginsWith) == 0)
00192                 {
00193                         p.push_back(*ii);
00194                 }
00195         }
00196         return (p.size() > 0);
00197 }
